resources.string: Reconstruction of Mira Avenue (Dnipropetrovsk). 13 thousand sq.m. of a tile will be paved and 33 lamps with support are mounted. On boulevard part of the avenue will establish shops. Along the boulevard there will pass the bicycle track 3 m wide and 700 m long. On perimeter the boulevard will be protected. 500 trees, and along a tram cloth - ornamental shrubs will be planted. Reconstruction of boulevard part of Mira Avenue is carried out at the expense of the city budget. 10 million UAH are allocated for these purposes.
